issue.title: Console_TEST creates a bunch of garbage directories in the home directory

content.raw:
Pull request #60 addresses this issue.

The culprit was the file logger, which makes its logging directories relative to the home directory. I've tweaked the tests to funnel all the test log files into a `~/tmp-ign/` directory.

Edit: I also have it clear the directories once the tests are finished so we don't endlessly pollute the file system.
